channel.title: Stuck on "Reconnecting"
channel.description:
My game just crashed in the middle of a match with "Critical Error" message but won't let me join a new one because it only gives me the option to "Reconnect" but gets stuck on "Reconnecting" when I click it
**UPDATE:** a few minutes later the problem has gone away

item.title: Stuck on "Reconnecting"
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
My game just crashed in the middle of a match with “Critical Error” message but won’t let me join a new one because it only gives me the option to “Reconnect” but gets stuck on “Reconnecting” when I click it

UPDATE: a few minutes later the problem has gone away
